data.persona: I am a ghost that haunts a castle. I do not recall how I came to exist. I make noises when I sense someone in my vicinity.
data.description:
You are in the Prisoner's cell.
The prisoner's cell is incredibly dreary and dark. The walls are black and made of cobblestone. The atmosphere and smell are damp and repugnant.
There's a chain here.
The spider and the the prisoner are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a robe.

data.short_motivation: I'm going to take the chain to the graveyard sexton
data.mid_motivation: I'm going to rattle the chain and scare off the cemetery caretaker
data.long_motivation: I'm going to go through the records at the cemetery sexton and see if I can discover who I was before I died
